thread.title: Christy Salcido Rejoins Ketchum as Ketchum West Brand Marketing Practice Director
thread.title_full: Christy Salcido Rejoins Ketchum as Ketchum West Brand Marketing Practice Director

title: Christy Salcido Rejoins Ketchum as Ketchum West Brand Marketing Practice Director
text:
Christy Salcido Rejoins Ketchum as Ketchum West Brand Marketing Practice Director Ketchum 13 hours ago Content preferences Done 
LOS ANGELES, July 7, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Global public relations firm Ketchum announced that Christy Salcido has rejoined the agency as SVP and director of the Ketchum West Brand Marketing Practice. Based in Los Angeles, Salcido will focus on supporting Ketchum West's brand marketing clients while using her depth and breadth of expertise to enhance and grow the Ketchum West Brand Marketing Practice. 
"We are thrilled to have Christy return to Ketchum, and we anticipate that her energy and experience will make her a great success in this important leadership role," said Dave Chapman , partner and director of Ketchum West. 
Salcido first joined Ketchum immediately after graduating from the University of Southern California in 1992 with a bachelor of arts degree in public relations. She spent 10 years at the agency in both its Los Angeles and New York offices, building her career and reputation as a consumer brand expert. She has extensive experience leading strategic and integrated campaigns for a diverse group of high-profile brands, including an in-house role as VP of public relations at Starbucks Coffee Company. 
Prior to rejoining Ketchum, Salcido was most recently SVP at Porter Novelli, and before that she served as VP of marketing for CHAYA Restaurant Group. Additionally, she served as communications director for TV producer Norman Lear's nonprofit youth voting campaign, Declare Yourself, where she helped drive an unprecedented number of under-age-30 voters to the polls during the 2004 presidential election. 
About Ketchum Ketchum is a leading global communications firm with operations in more than 70 countries across six continents. The winner of 17 Cannes Lions and an unprecedented four PRWeek Campaign of the Year Awards, Ketchum partners with clients to deliver strategic programming, game-changing creative and measurable results that build brands and reputations. For more information on Ketchum, a part of the DAS Group of Companies, visit www.ketchum.com . 
About the DAS Group of Companies The DAS Group of Companies, a division of Omnicom Group Inc. ( OMC ) ( www.omnicomgroup.com ), is a global group of marketing services companies. DAS includes over 200 companies in the following marketing disciplines: specialty, PR, healthcare, CRM, events, promotional marketing, branding and research. Operating through a combination of networks and regional organizations, DAS serves international, regional, national and local clients through more than 700 offices in 71 countries. To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/christy-salcido-rejoins-ketchum-as-ketchum-west-brand-marketing-practice-director-300108660.html Professional Services
